00020 namespace x2d {

00024     class object_cfg;

00031     struct object_traits
00032     {
00033         object_traits()
00034         : position(0.0f,0.0f)
00035         , scale(0.0f)
00036         , rotation(0.0f)
00037         , want_screen_touch_input(false)
00038         , want_world_touch_input(true)
00039         , want_accelerometer_input(false)
00040         , has_animation(false)
00041         {            
00042         }
00043         
00044         // basic object properties
00045         vector_2d   position;
00046         float       scale;
00047         float       rotation;
00048         
00049         // input methods requested by object
00050         bool        want_screen_touch_input;
00051         bool        want_world_touch_input;
00052         bool        want_accelerometer_input;
00053         
00054         // graphics
00055         bool        has_animation;
00056         std::string animation;
00057     };
00058     
00062     class object 
00063     : public base_object    
00064     {        
00065     public:
00066         object(kernel& k, config::configuration& c, const object_traits& t=object_traits());
00067         
00068         virtual ~object() 
00069         {
00070         }
00071         
00072     protected:
00073         
00074         virtual void update(const clock_info& clock);        
00075         virtual void render(const clock_info& clock); 
00076         
00077         config::configuration& config()
00078         {
00079             return config_;
00080         }
00081         
00082         vector_2d   position_;
00083         float       scale_;
00084         float       rotation_;
00085         
00086         boost::shared_ptr<animation> cur_animation_;
00087         
00088         std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<object> >     children_;
00089         
00090     private:
00091         config::configuration&  config_;
00092     };
